Exploit Weakness.name: Exploit Weakness
Exploit Weakness.flavor: Your arcane insight guides you to an enemy’s weakness, letting you exploit that vulnerability.
Exploit Weakness.onHit: 3[W] + Intelligence modifier damage. This attack deals extra damage equal to the target’s highest vulnerability.

Elemental Stance.name: Elemental Stance
Elemental Stance.flavor: You speak a few words of an ancient spell, instilling your attacks with the power to bestow vulnerability on a foe.
Elemental Stance.effect: When you use this power, choose acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder. Until the stance ends, whenever you hit an enemy, that creature gains vulnerable 5 to the chosen damage type until the end of your next turn.

Flaw Seeking Strike.name: Flaw Seeking Strike
Flaw Seeking Strike.flavor: You recognize a flaw in a creature’s defenses, and you focus your attacks on that weakness.
Flaw Seeking Strike.onHit: 3[W] + Intelligence modifier damage, and ongoing 5 damage of a type of your choice to which the target is vulnerable (save ends). If the target has no vulnerabilities, it takes ongoing 10 damage of a type of your choice from among acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder (save ends).
Flaw Seeking Strike.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 5 damage of a type of your choice (save ends).
